Class NewTaskPopupController

java.lang.Object
com.rocketshipcheckingtool.ui.roles.technician.NewTaskPopupController
public class NewTaskPopupController extends Object
Controller class for managing the popup window for creating a new task. Handles user input, validation, and task creation logic.

    • initialize

      public void initialize()
      Initializes the controller and sets up the create button's action. Validates input fields and handles task creation.

      Parameters:

    • getDescription

      public String getDescription()
      Retrieves the task description entered by the user.
      Returns:
      The task description as a string.

    • getMechanic

      public Mechanic getMechanic()
      Retrieves the selected mechanic from the ComboBox.
      Returns:
      The selected Mechanic object, or null if no mechanic is selected.
